review: Like many users, I found the Fire Stick had poor wifi capability.  I have 50mps internet service with only a phone and tablet connected via wifi.  It took over 2 hours to get the Fire Stick installed, then I kept losing connectivity.  I purchased MLB.TV, hoping to use the Fire Stick to watch it. It buffered every 10-15 seconds, making watching unbearable,This might work better for computers or laptops, but did not work on my TV.  Amazon allowed me to return it without any hassle.
author: Amazon Customer
